scripts.cypress:run:report: npm run cypress:clean && cypress run --record false --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options "reportDir=cypress/results,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true,charts=true,reportPageTitle='SauceDemo - Reporte de Pruebas Automatizadas',embeddedScreenshots=true,inlineAssets=true" --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:clean: if exist cypress\results rmdir /s /q cypress\results && if exist cypress\reports rmdir /s /q cypress\reports
scripts.generate:full:report: npm run cypress:clean && npm run cypress:run:report && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
